content.question: Which of the following is a correct comparison of authoritarian and democratic regimes?

choices.label: China allows for more freedom of the media, while Nigeria has more restrictions of the media.
Russia has more arbitrary rules by the leadership, while Mexico has a defined rule of law.
Iran has more civil liberties, while the United Kingdom has less competition in elections.
China allows for more citizen participation in elections, while Mexico has less transparency in government decisions.

content.answer: Russia has more arbitrary rules by the leadership, while Mexico has a defined rule of law.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
